title: Pogadhae Pogadhae Lyrics Damaal Dumeel Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Pogadhae Pogadhae
Singer(s): Remya Nambeesan
Lyricist: Thamarai
Movie: Damaal Dumeel
Music: Thaman S

Pogadhe pogadhe
nee ponaal endhan nenjam thaangaadhe.
Ennai nee, neengaadhe
nallathor veenai seidha pinbam
kollayil veesichella mundha.

Ennai nee pirindhu
sella sella sella sella
ennuyir parandhu sellumey

Pogadhe pogadhe
nee ponaal endhan nenjam thaangaadhe

Un thozhai thozhai unjal aakki
naanum saaindhu aadi aadi viluven
anbaale maraven.

En selai thannai porvaiyaakki
neeyum aalndhu thoonga thoonga tharuven
muththangal iduven.

Kaattrile ketkum osai ellaam
kadhile vandhu thaikkum ullam
vazhvile neeyum illai illai illai
endral naanum yen vazhavendum sol ?

Pogadhe pogadhe
nee ponaal endhan nenjam thaangaadhe

Hey naanum neeyum malai maattrum
malai mattrum soppanangal kalayum
sollaamal sidhayum.

Modhirangal vaangum podhu
muthu vaira karkkal karkkal udaiyum
mugoorththam thavarum.

Pogadhe pogadhe
nee ponaal endhan nenjam thaangaadhe
Andrilaai vazha naanum vandhen
annamaai .. thaaney thandhen
unnaiye enni enni enni vazhndha
vazhndha ennaiye marandhu ponadhen.

seo.description: Get the complete Pogadhae Pogadhae Lyrics Damaal Dumeel Song Lyrics from Damaal Dumeel. Read the lyrics penned by Thamarai and composed by Thaman S and sung by Ramya Nambeesan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Thamarai, Damaal Dumeel, Thaman S, Ramya Nambeesan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
